#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		cin>>n;
		map<string,int>m;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			string s;
			char b;
			cin>>s;
			cin>>b;
			if(b=='+')
			{
				m[s]=1;
			}
			else
			{
				m[s]=-1;
			}
		}
		int ans=0;
		map<string,int>::iterator iter;
		for(iter=m.begin();iter!=m.end();iter++)
		{
			ans+=iter->second;
		}
		cout<<ans<<"\n";
	}
}
